name: 實驗設計與資料分析
description: In this course, we will cover major applications of statistical data analysis in the field of biological sciences. We will emphasize on the experimental/sampling designs that are appropriate for each data analysis approach. Students are expected to actively participate in group discussion and lab exercises (using R), and each student will present an independent final project demonstrating her/his ability to apply appropriate statistical analyses to a real-world data set, given the scientific questions being posted and the experimental design used to collect the data.
syllabus:
授課方式：16+2週

1\. Course Introduction, data analyses

2\. Statistics and Data, Introduction to using JMP, Normal distribution

3\. Sampling distribution

4. Testing Hypotheses

5. One-Sample

6. Comparing two treatments I

7\. Comparing two treatments II

8\. Midterm

9\. Single-factor ANOVA I

10\. Single-factor ANOVA II – Multiple comparisons

11\. Two-factor ANOVA I

12\. Two-factor ANOVA II – Multiple comparisons, Randomized Block Designs 

13\. Repeated Measures, Nested Designs, Analysis of Covariance

14\. Project presentation

15. Project presentation

16. Final exam

17\. 自主學習

18\. 自主學習
